title: WASH - Clean Water & Sanitation
text: Providing WASH facilities and clean water access for the most vulnerable individuals and communities across Afghanistan

title: Community-Based Education
text: Supporting equal education opportunities through community-based education programs for children in rural areas

title: Emergency Response & Relief
text: Rapid emergency response to natural disasters, floods, and humanitarian crises affecting communities in Afghanistan

title: Food Security & Agriculture
text: Supporting local farmers and ensuring sustainable food sources for vulnerable families in rural districts

title: Women Empowerment
text: Providing sustainable livelihood opportunities and skills training for women in traditional crafts and agriculture

title: Community Development
text: Collaborating with local communities to identify and address their most pressing development needs
